channel.title: Project Dynamite Hack [317]
channel.description:
[center][size=5]Dynamite Hack 317[/size][/center]
NOTE : I know it does not look all so great but I worked on this for about 1 week so it obviously wont look spectacular.
Hosting : At this time I am hosting my server directly from my computer. This computer can hold up to 70 players with no lag. Once this server is up and running I will create a advertisement topic and hopefully receive more players. I'll be buying a VPS ( Virtual Private Server ) Hosting Server. I may buy a Dedicated Hosting Server if its stable enough. E.g. 2-3 GB RaM.
Finishing Touch : I hope to complete this project with in 2 months. I have plans for this server which will require alot of time. Hopefully I will stick with 2 months.
Range : I've added full ranging. Projectiles ect. Magic Bow has special now. I've also added new range timers.
New Server Models : Dragon Claws, Statius hammer
[IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/customitems.png[/img]
Videos : Client - http://youtube.com/watch?v=otuexUJ90po&fmt=18 Specials - http://youtube.com/watch?v=VDrgEkaQiuA&fmt=18
Server Features :
[ul][*]100% Magic [*]95% Range [*]88% Non-Combat skills [*]95% Weapon Specials [*]100% Prayer effects [*]100% Prayer Requirements [*]11 quests [*]New Training Grounds [*]Full Walking (No Noclip) - Video will be uploaded soon... [*]Nearly all aggressive Npc's [*]100% Teleporting [*]85% Clan Chat [*]100% Character Designing[/ul]
Client Features :
[ul][*]Item, Npc, Object lists [*]New Prayer Models [*]Fully working orbs[/ul]
And much more...
[IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/projectpicture.png[/img] [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/dynamitehack9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/dynamitehack6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/dynamitehack7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/dynamitehack8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/dynamitehack11.png[/img] [CENTER]Server Developers
[ul][*]Trevor ( Graphics of Rune-S ) [*]Dakota ( I end I of Rune-S ) - Basic Help and configuration[/ul] [/CENTER]
Thanks for reading, Trevor

item.title: Project Dynamite Hack [317]

item.description:
@The_Graphics wrote:

[center][size=5]Dynamite Hack 317[/size][/center]

NOTE : I know it does not look all so great but I worked on this for about 1 week so it obviously wont look spectacular.

Hosting : At this time I am hosting my server directly from my computer. This computer can hold up to 70 players with no lag. Once this server is up and running I will create a advertisement topic and hopefully receive more players. I’ll be buying a VPS ( Virtual Private Server ) Hosting Server. I may buy a Dedicated Hosting Server if its stable enough. E.g. 2-3 GB RaM.

Finishing Touch : I hope to complete this project with in 2 months. I have plans for this server which will require alot of time. Hopefully I will stick with 2 months.
